episode_title: Finding Your Center When Everything Feels Out of Control

chapters.summary: This podcast is not meant to be a substitute for therapy. How to find the calm in yourself, how to stay centered, especially when everything else around you feels chaotic. Please speak to a mental health professional.
chapters.headline: This podcast is not meant to be a substitute for therapy or mental health counseling
chapters.gist: How to Find the Calm in a Chaotic World

chapters.summary: This episode is about finding that calm within, no matter what's happening around us. When we face issues beyond our direct influence, our minds sometimes struggle to cope. Similar dynamics play out all over the world. There are things we can do to calm our minds and approach each day with resilience.
chapters.headline: This episode is about finding that calm within when facing difficult situations
chapters.gist: How to Find Calm Through Everyday Life

chapters.summary: As a Black woman, I feel like this is something that is very, very strong and prevalent in our culture. I would personally rather have a conversation about being resilient than being strong. Resilient often stems from having to. But it comes from community bonds and spirituality and meaningful daily practices.
chapters.headline: So let's chat about resilience. As a Black woman, I feel like this is something

chapters.summary: unlimited premium wireless for $15 a month. $45 upfront payment equivalent to $15 per month. New customers on first three month plan only. Extra speed slower above 40 gigabytes.
chapters.headline: Ryan Reynolds unveils unlimited premium wireless for $15 a month
chapters.gist: mint wireless: unlimited plans for $15 a month

chapters.summary: Orcas use Monday. com to keep their teamwork sharp, their communication clear, and their goals in sight. We even have an automated notification for all pod managers when they go live. Even orcas go to Monday. com to dive deeper.
chapters.headline: Orcas use Monday. com to keep their teamwork sharp and communication clear

chapters.summary: When you feel overwhelmed, start by focusing on your breath. This helps bring you back to the present moment and it gently soothes your nervous system. Also tapping into your support network, communities and connections are vital in helping us feel grounded.
chapters.headline: Let's talk about practical techniques for cultivating calmness. One of my favorite is mindfulness and breath work

chapters.summary: As we wrap up today's episode, I want to remind you to focus on the things that you can control. The way that you show up in this world, the choices that you make, what kind of person you are, your values, Your breath, moving your body. If this resonates with you, please share, like subscribe.
chapters.headline: As we wrap up today's episode, I want to remind you that you can control everything

chapters.summary: Boost Mobile is offering a 30 day money back guarantee. Applies to online activations. Requires port in and auto pay. Customers activating in stores may be charged non refundable activation fees.
chapters.headline: Boost Mobile is offering a 30 day money back guarantee for new customers
chapters.gist: Boost Mobile's 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

chapters.summary: Progressive makes it easy to see if you could save when you bundle your home and auto policies. BOMBAS presents unsolicited gifting advice. Use code acast for 20% off your first purchase. Not available in all states.
chapters.headline: BOMBAS offers unsolicited gifting advice on Progressive Insurance
